text: allaha ta'ala'e ja tamara manthi ekane bija para rojimam vadharo apyo che, basa! Jemane vadhare apavamam avyum che, te potani roji potani hethala kama karanara majurone nathi apata, e bhayathi ke te (jemane vadhare apyum che) ane te'o (majuro) banne sarakha tha'i jaya. To sum a loko allahani ne'amatono inkara kari rahya che
